chinese: 现在是8点钟.
english: It is eight o'clock.

chinese: 孩子们每天都乘小汽车去上学,
english: The children go to school by car every day,

chinese: 而今天, 他们正步行上学.
english: but today, they are going to school on foot.

chinese: 现在是10点钟.
english: It is ten o'clock.

chinese: 上午, Sawyers夫人通常是呆在家里的,
english: Mrs. Sawyer usually stays at home in the morning,

chinese: 但今天上午, 她正去商店买东西.
english: but this morning, she is going to the shops.

chinese: 现在是4点钟.
english: It is four o'clock.

chinese: 下午,
english: In the afternoon,

chinese: Sawyers夫人通常是在客厅里喝茶.
english: Mrs. Sawyer usually drinks tea in the living room.

chinese: 但今天下午, 她正在花园里喝茶.
english: But this afternoon, she is drinking tea in the garden.

chinese: 现在是6点钟.
english: It is six o'clock.

chinese: 晚上,
english: In the evening,

chinese: 孩子们通常是做他们的作业,
english: the children usually do their homework,

chinese: 而今天晚上,
english: but this evening,

chinese: 他们没做他们的作业.
english: they are not doing their homework.

chinese: 此刻, 他们正在花园里玩.
english: At the moment, they are playing in the garden.

chinese: 现在是9点钟.
english: It is nine o'clock.

chinese: Sawyers先生通常是在晚上看报.
english: Mr. Sawyer usually reads his newspaper at night.

chinese: 但今天晚上他没看报.
english: But he's not reading his newspaper tonight.

chinese: 此刻, 他正在看一本有趣的书.
english: At the moment, he's reading an interesting book.
